languages.text:
After more than 4 creatures die in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area, the Overseer and their allies starting in this area have +1 AP.
Allies (except for familiars) that fall unconscious also count.

traits.locale_text:
After more than 4 creatures die in the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolation{/g} area, the Overseer and their allies starting in this area have +1 AP.
Allies (except for familiars) that fall unconscious also count.

languages.text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: После того как в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов потеряют сознание союзники или умрут другие существа в общей сложности 5 раз, надзиратель и союзные персонажи, начинающие {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в этой области, получают +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: После того как в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов потеряют сознание союзники или умрут другие существа в общей сложности 5 раз, надзиратель и его союзники, начинающие {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в этой области, получают 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

После того как в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов потеряют сознание союзники или умрут другие существа в общей сложности 5 раз, надзиратель и его союзники, начинающие {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в этой области, получают 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

После того как в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов потеряют сознание союзники или умрут другие существа в общей сложности 5 раз, надзиратель и союзные персонажи, начинающие {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} в этой области, получают +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text: サーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内に合計5体の生物が死亡するか、味方が戦闘不能になると、その範囲内に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始した監督者と味方は +1の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: サーヴォスカル・スウォームの周囲4セル以内に合計5体の生物が死亡するか、味方が戦闘不能になると、その範囲内に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始した監督者と味方は +1の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Lorsqu'un total de 5 créatures sont mortes ou qu'un total de 5 personnages alliés ont perdu connaissance dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, le surveillant et les personnages alliés qui commencent leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} dans cette zone gagnent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un total de 5 créatures sont mortes ou qu'un total de 5 personnages alliés ont perdu connaissance dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes, le surveillant et les personnages alliés qui commencent leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} dans cette zone gagnent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: Después de que cinco criaturas hayan muerto o aliados hayan quedado inconscientes en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos, el supervisor y los aliados que empiecen su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en ese radio ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Después de que cinco criaturas hayan muerto o aliados hayan quedado inconscientes en un radio de 4 casillas en torno al enjambre de servocráneos, el supervisor y los aliados que empiecen su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en ese radio ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text: 在距离伺服头骨集群4格内的区域内，当死亡的生物与陷入昏迷的盟友数量共计达到5名时，监察官与其他盟友在该区域内开始{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在距离伺服头骨集群4格内的区域内，当死亡的生物与陷入昏迷的盟友数量共计达到5名时，监察官与其他盟友在该区域内开始{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Sobald insgesamt fünf Kreaturen tot oder verbündete Charaktere in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm bewusstlos sind, beginnen der Aufseher und verbündete Charaktere in diesem Bereich ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mit +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Sobald insgesamt fünf Kreaturen tot oder verbündete Charaktere in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm bewusstlos sind, beginnen der Aufseher und verbündete Charaktere in diesem Bereich ihren {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mit +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde toplamda beş yaratık ölürse veya dost karakter baygın düşerse {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarına{/g} o alanda başlayan Gözetmen ve dost karakterler, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: After a total of five creatures have died or allied characters have fallen unconscious in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm, the Overseer and allied characters starting their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in that area gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde toplamda beş yaratık ölürse veya dost karakter baygın düşerse {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarına{/g} o alanda başlayan Gözetmen ve dost karakterler, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır.
